For everyone else, you can easily download an English subtitle online (srt file) and then add it to this downloaded movie file folder; then you right click on the movie itself, hit video, then "open" the srt Eng. subtitle.  Easy.  This is honestly the best copy available out there so far, so don't just not download it because there's not built-in English subtitles.  TRUST me please!!!

The subtitles for the Na-Vi speech are in german, but other than that the quality is quite a bit higher than the version uploaded by extremezone.

Correction:
The subtitle track posted by Akhen1 (http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5245953) solves the german subtitle problem. Just put the .srt file in the same folder as the .avi file of the movie, and if you're using VLC, just add the subtitle track in Video > Subtitles Track > Open File, and find the .srt file.
